resources.string: No Tags Yet.\n\nPlease add a tag widget to your homescreen and press it to tag your life.
No Badges Yet.\n\nEarn badges by adding a tag widget to your homescreen and tagging your life.

Thanks for installing Life Tag! This application lets you Tag your Life Activities, and see a diary of what you have been up to, as well as earn badges for entering tags.

This application is part of a scientific study designed to help researchers at SenseOS and the VU University Amsterdam learn to recognize your behaviour and current status using your smartphone. Using the Sense platform this app will gather data about your activities and store it in the CommonSense data storage facility.

By using this application you concent to allowing your anonymized data to be used by researchers in order to better recognize your daily activities.

Note that you have complete control over what data is gathered by your device using the preferences provided by the application.

Please login, or register a free CommonSense account and add the life tag widget to your homescreen to begin tagging your life.

Thank you for participating in our research!
